data.name: Dominion - Intrigue: 1st Edition
data.detailed_description:
Play with Secret Chamber, Great Hall, Coppersmith, Scout, Saboteur and Tribute in this set of cards that were included in the original release of Intrigue. The Intrigue expansion first released with twenty five sets of kingdom cards and as the game grew, a second edition was published. The second edition removed some of the cards we know and love, and added new ones. For a nostalgic game, fire up the first edition with this set and play the cards that introduced you to Dominion expansions.


This set of cards includes those cards that were originally in the Intrigue expansion, but have been removed for second edition.

Included Cards
  • Secret Chamber - A versatile attack reaction
  • Great Hall - A Victory cantrip
  • Coppersmith - A copper value increaser
  • Scout - A deck inspector
  • Saboteur - A trashing attacker
  • Tribute - A card with variable bonus


    First edition cards can replace second edition cards, or be mixed in, however you choose to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
